newsitem.title: USA: Post Properties sees more rentals in late 97.
newsitem.headline: Post Properties sees more rentals in late 97.

text.p: Post Properties Inc Chairman John Williams said the company expects to post better rental -- same-store -- numbers as 1997 progress because there is an oversupply in the Atlanta rental market currently.
Williams made his comments in a press statement that accompanied the company's fourth-quarter earnings.
He said the oversupply should be absorbed as the year progresses. He did not make an estimate regarding the company's 1997 same-store figures. A spokeswoman declined to comment.
The company develops and rents properties in the U.S. Southeast. It said its same-store revenue rose 1.9 percent for the fourth-quarter of 1996, compared with a year earlier.
